explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a hybrid prediction model combining GARCH and LSTM, which is a machine learning approach for forecasting carbon trading prices.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions the use of a neural network (LSTM) as part of the hybrid prediction model.
explanations.deep learning: LSTM is a type of deep learning model, and the paper uses it for time series forecasting.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper explicitly uses an LSTM network as part of the GARCH-LSTM hybrid model for carbon price prediction.
explanations.LSTM: The paper uses LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory) networks in its proposed hybrid model for time series forecasting of carbon prices.
